Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza A Subtyping Kit
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Analyte(s): Universal influenza A viruses (animal and human)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza A Subtyping Kit for detection and subtyping of influenza A viruses using RT-PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: For determination of the subtype of seasonal human influenza A viruses (A/H1, A/H3, A/H1pdm09) from viral RNA in upper and lower respiratory tract specimens in patients with respiratory infection symptoms and/or from viral culture; provides epidemiologic information for influenza surveillance.
